options.option: Contains <u>primary resources</u> of Singapore’s cultural heritage such as speeches, interviews and photographs.
An <u>online encyclopedia</u> on modern Singapore containing a collection of articles.
An archive database on <u>happenings</u> and <u>major breakthroughs that happened daily</u>.
An online resource guide containing quick facts on important <u>social historical events</u>.
A collection of digital images, including photographs and artworks.
